mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.menu_id AS "menuId", a.`code` AS "code", a.`name` AS "name", a.url AS "url", a.type AS "type", a.is_auth AS "auth", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.is_del AS "del"
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_url set is_del = ${DEL_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT su.id AS "id", su.`code` AS `code`, su.permission AS 'permission', su.menu_id AS "menuId", su.`name` AS `name`, su.url AS "url", su.type AS "type", su.is_auth AS "auth", GROUP_CONCAT(sru.role_id) AS 'roleIds' FROM sys_url AS su LEFT JOIN sys_role_url AS sru ON su.id = sru.url_id WHERE su.is_del = '0' GROUP BY su.id
